author.persName: Muhammad Husayn b. Sayyid Muhammad Hadi al-'Aqili al-'Alawi.

msItem.title: Makhzan al-Adwiyah wa Tadhkirat Uli al-Nuha. Vol. II.
msItem.note: Follows on from Codrington/Reade No 198. In the same format and written by the same scribe. The old foliation is followed through, giving ff350-701. Flyleaf preceding text, recto; a note of Colebrooke's presentation, as on vol. I. Flyleaf following text, verso: similar note in pencil. Manuscript consists of continuation of the sixth chapter and to the twentieth chapter of the work. Headings in red.

bindingDesc.p: Binding uniform with vol. I Front cover detached.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
